analysis.description:
FantomToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/43/0x91fe1bb9ec34aa1e3a44391c3c9ec6634316a7f1.sol#99-100) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/43/0x91fe1bb9ec34aa1e3a44391c3c9ec6634316a7f1.sol#206-218)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/43/0x91fe1bb9ec34aa1e3a44391c3c9ec6634316a7f1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/43/0x91fe1bb9ec34aa1e3a44391c3c9ec6634316a7f1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/43/0x91fe1bb9ec34aa1e3a44391c3c9ec6634316a7f1.sol#76-77) is not in mixedCase
